select spacepost_id, spacepost_shopname, spacepost_memo, smember_id from (select spacepost_id, spacepost_shopname, spacepost_memo,spacepost_area,spacepost_sort,smember_id from spacepost
where spacepost_startdate >TO_DATE(#spacepost_startdate#, 'yy/mm/dd') and spacepost_finishdate < TO_DATE( #spacepost_finishdate#, 'yy/mm/dd') and spacepost_shopname like #spacepost_shopname#)
spacepost_area= #spacepost_area#
spacepost_sort=#spacepost_sort#
select spacepost_id, spacepost_shopname, spacepost_memo, smember_id from spacepost natural join (select distinct spacepost_id from hashtag where hashtag_name like #hash_name#)
